import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; function UserTicket(){ // const [ticket, setticket] = useState([]) const [eventname,seteventname] = useState(''); const [eventprice,seteventprice] = useState(''); const {id} = useParams(); useEffect(()=> { axios.get('http://localhost:4000/vieweventfortickets/'+id) .then(uservalue =>{console.log(uservalue) seteventname(uservalue.data.title) seteventprice(uservalue.data.ticket) }) },[]) return(
